name: Pastel Color Twitter Pink Add on
description: How to use 1. install this style. 2. install Pastel Color Twitter 3. click "More" on left side, next click "Display" to show "Customize your view" dialog 3. select "Pink" on twitter "Color" (the third from the left) üç∫üç∫üç∫ If you like this, you can buy us a beer! üç∫üç∫üç∫
